create.create_tips: You can create personal identities and connect to social accounts.

restore.title: Enter mnemonics
restore.tips: Please select words in order according to your mnemonic words.
restore.enterTips: Enter 12 mnemonic words in order and separate them with space.

confirmation.title: Confirmation
confirmation.tips: Please select words in order according to your mnemonic words.

mnemonic.mnemonic_tips: Mnemonic words are the only proof to help you recover your wallet.
mnemonic.mnemonic_label: I have kept the above mnemonics properly.

download.title: Download Preview
download.tips: Please keep the information on this page properly.

create.tips: Please create or restore your first and connect to social accounts.

walletHome.createTips: A new wallet account and account mnemonics will be created for you
walletHome.importTips: Use the mnemonics you backed up before, import them into wallet, restore the wallet and start using it.

step1.subTitle: Create wallet
step1.tips: The payment password must contain numbers, upper and lower case letters and special characters, with a length of 8-20 characters.

step2.subTitle: Account mnemonics
step2.tips: Mnemonic words are the only proof to help you recover your wallet.

step3.subTitle: Confirmation mnemonics
step3.tips: Please select words in order according to your mnemonic words.

import.title: Import Accound
import.subTitle: Import Private Key
import.tips: Imported accounts will not be associated with your originally created wallet account Secret Recovery Phrase.

mnemonics.title: Import Wallet
mnemonics.subTitle: Import
mnemonics.tips: Imported accounts will not be associated with your originally created wallet account Secret Recovery Phrase.
mnemonics.inputTips: Enter 12 mnemonic words in order and separate them with space.

lock.tips: Welcome back ！Coming soon to the decentralized web !
